aircraft.value: Cyclops Vision - AC-8188-545 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Fuel control unit drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 22/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 25/05/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/05/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 26/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 27/05/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel control unit drift. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
